article_title: NSA Fears Prompt Companies to Move Data Out of U.S.
article_text: Bridging the gap between traditional delivery models that work well for enterprise operations and models that work well for high-speed innovation can be difficult. A growing number of CIOs are tailoring their approaches—striking a balance between stability and agility in IT.

twitter.description: Some Canadian and UK small businesses are moving data out of the US due to fears of NSA snooping, according to a new survey.
twitter.title: NSA Fears Prompt Companies to Move Data Out of U.S.

article_summary:
A growing number of CIOs are tailoring their approaches—striking a balance between stability and agility in IT.
Bridging the gap between traditional delivery models that work well for enterprise operations and models that work well for high-speed innovation can be difficult.
